## Upload Data

```{r}

proj_1_data = read_csv("data/Project_1_Data.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  mutate(wkly_study_hours = 
           case_match(
             wkly_study_hours,
             "< 5" ~ "< 5 hours",
             "10-May" ~ "5-10 hours",
             "> 10" ~ "> 10 hours"
           ),
         ethnic_group = 
           case_match(
             ethnic_group,
             "group A" ~ "A",
             "group B" ~ "B",
             "group C" ~ "C",
             "group D" ~ "D",
             "group E" ~ "E"
           )
         )

```
